name: dextop
description: is a window manager running in your browser

scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run minify
scripts.minify: cd dist; uglifyjs ${npm_package_name}.js --source-map --output ${npm_package_name}.min.js --compress --mangle -b beautify=false,preamble='"// http://g14n.info/dextop"'; cd -
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish

author: Gianluca Casati (http://g14n.info)
